original_text: Hezekiah received the letter from the hand of the messengers and read it; and Hezekiah went up to the house of the Lord and spread it before the Lord.
korean_text: 히스기야가 사자의 손에서 편지를 받아보고 여호와의 성전에 올라가서 히스기야가 그 편지를 여호와 앞에 펴 놓고

sentences.original_text: Hezekiah received the letter from the hand of the messengers
and Hezekiah went up to the house of the Lord
and spread it before the Lord
